When I first started KSP my Game Playing was very unorganized and thought this would be helpful to share. This is how I am using my Menu now.

![Lm093NX.png](%5Bimg%5Dhttp%3A//i.imgur.com/Lm093NX.png)

I don't see exactly what you mean. Those are different save games.

I name my most important save starting with "00" so it will always be first in the list. The rest I use rarely enough that it doesn't matter (and I won't remember anyway) where they are on the list.

I guess this thread could be titled "How do you use your Saved Games Menu" This would give others ideas how they could organize their Game Play? The reason I save my Games in this format is to keep all my Craft Types together, often I find myself scrolling through long list to find my Crafts and this helps to shorten that list.
